problem.title: Problem Four

description.html:
Suppose a Foucault pendulum is located at North latitude. At time the pendulum is displaced by in the x-direction. Plot the resulting motion of the pendulum over one sidereal day.
If you need assistance, please see Chapter 7 of Classical Mechanics with MATLAB Applications by Javier E. Hasbun
